title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status Snapshot

view.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status
view.subtitle: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

blocks.title: Member Review Bookings completed
blocks.message: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.
